text: Wunsiedel () is a Landkreis (district) in Bavaria, Germany. The district is in the mountains of the Fichtelgebirge, with the highest elevation the 1051 m high Schneeberg. The river Ohře () starts in the district. ==Towns and municipalities== Towns Municipalities #Arzberg #Hohenberg an der Eger¹ #Kirchenlamitz #Marktleuthen #Marktredwitz #Schönwald #Selb #Weißenstadt #Wunsiedel #Bad Alexandersbad¹ #Höchstädt im Fichtelgebirge¹ #Nagel¹ #Röslau #Schirnding¹ #Thiersheim¹ #Thierstein¹ #Tröstau¹ ¹ administered inside a Verwaltungsgemeinschaft ¹ administered inside a Verwaltungsgemeinschaft ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website (German) Category:Districts of Bavaria
title: Wunsiedel (district)
